TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationIdProvider

Docs.summary: An interface for providing an Application Id for a given Instrumentation Key.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetApplicationId (string instrumentationKey, out string applicationId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryGetApplicationId(string instrumentationKey, [out] string& applicationId) cil managed
Public Function TryGetApplicationId (instrumentationKey As String, ByRef applicationId As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: Instrumentation Key string used to lookup associated Application Id.
Application Id corresponding to the Instrumentation Key. Returns NULL if a match was not found.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the Application Id to be used for Request.Source or Dependency.Target
Docs.returns: TRUE if Application Id was successfully retrieved; FALSE otherwise.
Docs.remarks: Application Insights data model defines two fields: request.source and dependency.target. The first field identifies the component that initiated the dependency request, and the second identifies which component returned the response of the dependency call. For more information see: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/application-insights/application-insights-correlation
